pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modifications to Google Chromium for removing Google integration and enhancing privacy, control, and transparency

use.flag: Combine source files to speed up build process, at the expense of more memory during build time
Use media-libs/openh264 instead of the bundled one
Optimize parts of Chromium's UI written with web technologies (HTML/CSS/JS) for runtime performance purposes. This does more work at compile time for speed benefits at runtime
Enable proprietary codecs like H.264, MP3
Build the SUID sandbox, which is only needed on CONFIG_USER_NS=n kernels
Use system media-video/ffmpeg instead of the bundled one
Use system media-libs/harfbuzz instead of the bundled one
Use system dev-libs/icu instead of the bundled one
Use system dev-libs/libevent instead of the bundled one
Use system media-libs/libvpx instead of the bundled one
Use system media-libs/openjpeg instead of the bundled one, exclusively for Chromium's PDF viewer
Use bundled tcmalloc instead of system malloc
Unsupported closed-source DRM capability (required by Netflix VOD)
